```diff
- 
+ name: ğŸ¤– Automated Version Update
+ 
+ on:
+   workflow_dispatch:
+     inputs:
+       version_type:
+         description: 'Version update type'
+         required: true
+         default: 'patch'
+         type: choice
+         options:
+         - patch
+         - minor
+         - major
+       target_version:
+         description: 'Specific version (optional, overrides version_type)'
+         required: false
+         type: string
+   schedule:
+     # æ¯é€±æ—¥æ›œæ—¥ 03:00 UTC (12:00 JST) ã«è‡ªå‹•å®Ÿè¡Œ
+     - cron: '0 3 * * 0'
+ 
+ env:
+   PYTHON_VERSION: '3.12'
+ 
+ jobs:
+   automated-version-update:
+     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+     permissions:
+       contents: write
+       packages: write
+       pages: write
+       id-token: write
+     
+     steps:
+     - name: ğŸ” Checkout Repository
+       uses: actions/checkout@v4
+       with:
+         fetch-depth: 0
+         token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
+     
+     - name: ğŸ Setup Python
+       uses: actions/setup-python@v5
+       with:
+         python-version: ${{ env.PYTHON_VERSION }}
+         cache: 'pip'
```

```diff
- 
+ # lilToon PCSS Extension - PowerShell ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³æ›´æ–°è‡ªå‹•åŒ–ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ 
+ param(
+     [string]$Version,
+     [ValidateSet("major", "minor", "patch")]
+     [string]$Type = "patch",
+     [string]$WorkspaceRoot = "."
+ )
+ 
+ $ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"
+ $SessionId = "version_update_$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss')"
+ 
+ Write-Host "ğŸš€ lilToon PCSS Extension PowerShell ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³æ›´æ–°è‡ªå‹•åŒ–ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ  v2.0" -ForegroundColor Green
+ Write-Host "ğŸ“‹ ã‚»ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ID: $SessionId" -ForegroundColor Cyan
+ 
+ function Get-CurrentVersion {
+     $packageJsonPath = Join-Path $WorkspaceRoot "package.json"
+     if (Test-Path $packageJsonPath) {
+         $packageJson = Get-Content $packageJsonPath | ConvertFrom-Json
+         return $packageJson.version
+     }
+     return "0.0.0"
+ }
+ 
+ function Set-NewVersion {
+     param([string]$CurrentVersion, [string]$VersionType)
+     
+     $versionParts = $CurrentVersion.Split('.')
+     $major = [int]$versionParts[0]
+     $minor = [int]$versionParts[1]
+     $patch = [int]$versionParts[2]
+     
+     switch ($VersionType) {
+         "major" { $major++; $minor = 0; $patch = 0 }
+         "minor" { $minor++; $patch = 0 }
+         "patch" { $patch++ }
+     }
+     
+     return "$major.$minor.$patch"
+ }
+ 
+ function Update-PackageJson {
+     param([string]$NewVersion)
+     
+     Write-Host "ğŸ“ package.jsonæ›´æ–°ä¸­... (v$NewVersion)" -ForegroundColor Blue
+     
+     $packageJsonPath = Join-Path $WorkspaceRoot "package.json"
+     $packageJson = Get-Content $packageJsonPath | ConvertFrom-Json
+     $oldVersion = $packageJson.version
+     $packageJson.version = $NewVersion
+     
+     $packageJson | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Set-Content $packageJsonPath -Encoding UTF8
+     
+     Write-Host "âœ… package.jsonæ›´æ–°å®Œäº†: $oldVersion â†’ $NewVersion" -ForegroundColor Green
+     return $true
+ }
+ 
+ # ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³å®Ÿè¡Œ
+ try {
+     $currentVersion = Get-CurrentVersion
+     
+     if ($Version) {
+         if ($Version -notmatch '^\d+\.\d+\.\d+$') {
+             Write-Host "âŒ ç„¡åŠ¹ãªãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³å½¢å¼: $Version" -ForegroundColor Red
+             exit 1
+         }
+         $newVersion = $Version
+     } else {
+         $newVersion = Set-NewVersion $currentVersion $Type
+     }
+     
+     Write-Host "ğŸ“ˆ ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³æ›´æ–°: $currentVersion â†’ $newVersion" -ForegroundColor Cyan
+     
+     if (-not (Update-PackageJson $newVersion)) { exit 1 }
+     
+     Write-Host "ğŸ‰ PowerShellè‡ªå‹•åŒ–å®Œäº†!" -ForegroundColor Green
+     Write-Host "âœ… ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³: $currentVersion â†’ $newVersion" -ForegroundColor Green
+     
+ } catch {
+     Write-Host "âŒ PowerShellè‡ªå‹•åŒ–å®Ÿè¡Œã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
+     exit 1
+ }
+ 
```
